headline.main: $150,000,000 DRIVE SEEN IF WAR COMES; Joint Appeal by Red Cross Defense Service and Local Chests Is Being Mapped HOVING TELLS OF PLANS $10,765,000 Now Sought for Camps Only 'Chicken Feed' if We Fight, He Says

lead_paragraph: The possibility of a joint appeal for $150,000,000 by the American Red Cross, the United Service Organizations for National Defense and the Community Chests and Councils if the United States enters the war is already being discussed by officials of the three fund-raising groups, Walter Hoving, president of the United Service Organizations, disclosed yesterday.
abstract: joint fund drive with Amer Red Cross and Community Chests and Councils if U S enters war discussed, N Y C luncheon

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: DEFENSE, NATL, UNITED SERVICE ORGANIZATIONS FOR, INC
